name: spiraljs-demo

scripts.copy-sites-demo-css: cp node_modules/spiraljs/dist/spiral.css node_modules/spiraljs/dist/spiral.min.css docs/sites/demo/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap-theme.min.css docs/sites/demo/bootstrap-css/ && cp src/controls.css docs/sites/demo/
scripts.copy-sites-demo-deps: npm run copy-sites-demo-js && npm run copy-sites-demo-css && npm run copy-sites-demo-fonts && npm run copy-sites-demo-html
scripts.copy-sites-demo-js: cp src/main-script.js node_modules/d3/d3.min.js node_modules/crossfilter/crossfilter.min.js node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js node_modules/spiraljs/dist/spiral.min.js node_modules/spiraljs/dist/spiral.min.js.map docs/sites/demo/
scripts.predemo: npm run clean && mkdirp docs/sites/demo && mkdirp docs/sites/demo/fonts && mkdirp docs/sites/demo/bootstrap-css
scripts.purge: npm run clean & npm run clean-downloaded

author: Johan Hidding, Mateusz Kuzak, Jurriaan H. Spaaks, Lourens Veen, Faruk Diblen
